mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product_review(reviewNum,userId, content, productNum, created_date, score) VALUES (review_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#{userId},#{content},#{productNum}, SYSDATE,#{score})
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM product_review r JOIN member m ON r.userId = m.userId WHERE r.productNum=#{productNum}

SELECT reviewNum, r.userId , m.userName, content, r.productNum, r.created_date, score FROM product_review r JOIN member m ON r.userId= m.userId WHERE r.productNum=#{productNum} ORDER BY reviewNum DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{rows} ROWS ONLY
